replies.author: a1640727878
replies.txt_content:
plugin.yml那个改改 1.13必须加上

api-version: 1.13

和你的一模一样然后出这个
[17:07:50 ERROR]: Could not load 'plugins\MyPlugin.jar' in folder 'plugins'
